thread.title: See Congressman Sing 'Meet the Mets' After Losing Bet
thread.title_full: See Congressman Sing 'Meet the Mets' After Losing Bet

author: Kelly Terez
title: See Congressman Sing 'Meet the Mets' After Losing Bet
text:
Share Article 
Mark Wilson/Getty Images (WASHINGTON) -- Amazin! 
Rep. Adam Schiff is a Los Angeles Dodgers fan, but the California Democrat delivered on a bet he made with good friend and New York Mets fan Rep. Steve Israel, of New York, Friday on the House floor, singing "Meet the Mets" while wearing a tie emblazoned with the Mets logo. 
He ended with a plea for his time to expire and a jab at the New York Yankees. 
Schiff will also send Israel gourmet popcorn from Burbank, California as part of the bet on the Dodgers-Mets series earlier this month. 
The Mets won the series 3-2 and have since moved on to the World Series.
